description: Google offers internships in AI projects, software development, and scalable system design with mentorship and hands-on experience.
Meta provides internships in cybersecurity, virtual reality, and metaverse innovation with expert mentorship.
Microsoft offers HR and talent acquisition internships, focusing on recruitment and employee engagement.
Amazon provides internships in mobile app testing, deployment, and customer experience improvement.
Netflix offers internships focused on operations and supply chain optimization for content delivery.
Apple’s internships focus on mobile solutions testing, quality assurance, and performance improvement.
Intel offers operations and supply chain internships with emphasis on manufacturing and logistics.
Tesla internships involve product design, prototyping, and customer research in clean energy tech.
Adobe provides internships in UI development, front-end design, and scalable web applications.
IBM offers internships in AI, cloud computing, product design, and customer research.
Oracle provides cybersecurity internships focused on threat analysis and security strategy.
Spotify offers internships in scalable web app development and personalized recommendation features.
Snapchat’s parent company offers internships in mobile app testing and deployment.
Twitter provides internships in UI development, backend scalability, and user engagement.
Salesforce internships focus on UI components, scalable applications, and CRM solutions.
Dropbox offers internships in social media campaigns and digital marketing strategies.
Uber internships focus on mobile app testing, deployment, and user experience.
Airbnb offers internships in social media management and digital marketing.
Zoom provides HR internships focusing on talent acquisition and onboarding.
NVIDIA internships involve cloud services, AI computing, and data pipeline projects.
